text: Nobody's Fool is a 1994 American comedy-drama movie. The movie takes place in a fictional town in New York. It stars Paul Newman. Jessica Tandy, Melanie Griffith, Bruce Willis are also members of the cast. Nobody's Fool was released to very good review by critics. It also did well at the box office. == Other websites == * Category:1994 comedy-drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Benton Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Nobody's Fool (1994 movie)
